title: Best opening themes in your opinion?
body:
Which openings from anime, cartoon or other stuff made you watch them over and over without getting tired?

Mines:

Deadman Wonderland

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gl5NMctvZ6g

Mirai Nikki

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ql0NtjXIv_s

Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h-cfwEreRgQ

Renai Circulation

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-N6IM-L7fLw

Fresh Prince of Bel Air

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hBe0VCso0qs
